name: Traffic Racer Highway Online
description:
Traffic For Racer is Multiplayer racing and endless arcade racing, Challenge your friends and other player from around the world.
Drive your car through highway traffic, earn money and gold, buy new cars. and be the best racer in the leaderboards.

Traffic for Race: features
- 3D graphics, easy interface.
- 25 different cars inside garage.
- Realistic car handling
- 3 environments: desert, rainy and night
- 4 game modes: multiplayer challenge, daily event , Missions , friends challenge,
- customization : paint and wheels and upgrade
- Leaderboards and Achievements
